summary: A collection of example scripts demonstrating how to use NVIDIA NeMo for entity linking tasks, including building an embedding index for candidate entities, generating query embeddings and performing index look‑ups, and training a model with self‑alignment pretraining.
business_intent: Help developers and data scientists quickly set up and evaluate entity linking pipelines, enabling faster linking of textual mentions to knowledge‑base entities for applications such as search, recommendation, and information extraction.
